title: [Psychology] People who purchase a firearm during the pandemic are more likely to be suicidal than other firearm owners. 70 % of those who bought a firearm during the COVID-19 pandemic reported having suicidal thoughts throughout their lives, compared to 37 % of the rest of the community of gun owners.

[Epidemiology] The threat posed by anti-vaccination efforts on social media is critically important with the need for worldwide COVID-19 vaccination. A new study found that foreign disinformation campaigns on social media is statistically and significantly associated with declining vaccination coverage.
